blogPost.excerpt: As an early stage founder, it's hard to get in front of the right investors. The Premoney List is a mini-marketplace that presents two founders to a group of 600+ investors each week. 🚀 Founders: Meet more investors! 🕵🏽‍♀️ Investors: Discover new companies!
blogPost.body: As an early stage founder, it's hard to get in front of the right investors. The Premoney List is a mini-marketplace that presents two founders to a group of 600+ investors each week. 🚀 Founders: Meet more investors! 🕵🏽‍♀️ Investors: Discover new companies!
blogPost.title: The Premoney List - Connecting founders to investors, every week.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 作为一名早期创始人，很难在合适的投资者面前找到合适的投资者。PreMoney List是一个迷你市场，每周向600多名投资者展示两名创始人。🚀创建者：认识更多投资者！🕵🏽‍♀️投资者：发现新公司！
localize.tagline: 每周为创始人和投资者牵线搭桥。

localize.description: 作爲一名早期創始人，很難在合適的投資者面前找到合適的投資者。PreMoney List是一個迷你市場，每週向600多名投資者展示兩名創始人。🚀創建者：認識更多投資者！🕵🏽‍♀️投資者：發現新公司！
localize.tagline: 每週爲創始人和投資者牽線搭橋。

previous.excerpt: Struum takes the ClassPass model and applies it to streaming services. The team includes former Disney+ and Discovery exes.
previous.title: Struum - Classpass for streaming

localize.description: Struum采用ClassPass模型，并将其应用于流媒体服务。该团队包括前迪士尼+和探索频道的前高管。
Struum採用ClassPass模型，並將其應用於流媒體服務。該團隊包括前迪士尼+和探索頻道的前高管。

next.excerpt: Suffering from Zoom fatigue? Sick of meetings, get togethers and conferences? Boss asked a difficult question on video chat? Bufferi.ng gives you a simple way to stutter your webcam and distort the sound. Take back Control of Zoom
next.title: Bufferi.ng - Avoid pointless meetings, fake a bad connection on Zoom

localize.description: 患有变焦疲劳吗？厌倦了开会、聚会和会议？老板在视频聊天中问了一个难题？Bufferi.ng为您提供了一种简单的方法来卡顿您的网络摄像头并使声音失真。收回对缩放的控制
localize.tagline: 避免无意义的会议，在Zoom上伪造不良连接

localize.description: 患有變焦疲勞嗎？厭倦了開會、聚會和會議？老闆在視頻聊天中問了一個難題？Bufferi.ng爲您提供了一種簡單的方法來卡頓您的網絡攝像頭並使聲音失真。收回對縮放的控制
localize.tagline: 避免無意義的會議，在Zoom上僞造不良連接
